title: My client is actin up
body:
I just finished a game and i get onto my client and i can't go into a game as it says i don't own 16 champs, then i relogged and then it loaded, but the role select wont load and i get a ton of error messages, what going on?
I tried to play blind pick but i just get retrieving data from server. it was working fine before

replies.body:
I'm guessing you were trying to play a ranked game when it said you didn't own 16 champions? For more context on that, you need to personally own 16 champions (not including the free weekly rotating champions or any that are currently disabled) before you can start playing ranked matches. 

When the role select won't load, and you see an error saying "retrieving data from server", it typically means that you networks connection to our servers is becoming unstable. Check out our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for some ways you can give your connection a little pick-me-up.

Let me know if you have any other questions ^_^!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=nZ9uuJg0,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-20T22:15:38.915+0000)
>
> I'm guessing you were trying to play a ranked game when it said you didn't own 16 champions? For more context on that, you need to personally own 16 champions (not including the free weekly rotating champions or any that are currently disabled) before you can start playing ranked matches. 
> 
> When the role select won't load, and you see an error saying "retrieving data from server", it typically means that you networks connection to our servers is becoming unstable. Check out our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for some ways you can give your connection a little pick-me-up.
> 
> Let me know if you have any other questions ^_^!

It's fixed now, no worries :P thanks a lot
